price: 79. Tai Tas, Kuris sukūrė jus žemėje ir pas Jį jūs būsite atgal surinkti.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي ذَرَأَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī dhara-akum fī al-arḍi wa-ilayhi tuḥ'sharūna
